Job Description: Developers, ready for next Career move?MapmyIndia most perfect partner for maps, navigation, geospatial apps & services in India is looking for Software Developers-Here is the opportunity to work as part of a valued and collaborative team at MapmyIndia which being a truly Indian Company has embarked on the path of Aatmanirbhar Bharat.At MapmyIndia, we are focused on creating an innovative and collaborative working culture where we value the contribution of each Individual. In being a great place to work, we are proud to offer a range of experiences and opportunities that will help you to achieve your career and personal goals.Required Candidate Profile:-1) Bachelors in Computer Science & Engineering/IT.2) Experience/ Interest-0-5 years in Software Development.3) Hands on knowledge/experience in the following domain:iOSAndroidAngular 8/9Data ScientistJavaC++Node.js.Professional Attributes:-1) Proficient in Identifying, analyzing and solving Problems.2) Independently manage tasks, Self-Starter.3) Resilient and able to easily adapt to change.4) Strong Analytical, interpersonal communication skills.5) Delivers High Quality Work.
